name: Chicken Rosemary Thyme
description: This Chicken Rosemary Thyme recipe is the epitome of a wholesome, nutritious meal, perfectly suitable for health-conscious individuals. Featuring high-protein, low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar ingredients, it's crafted to cater to those pursuing a healthy lifestyle without compromising on flavor. Each bite is infused with the aromatic essences of rosemary and thyme, promising a delightful culinary experience.

recipeInstructions.text: Pat the chicken fillets dry with paper towels to ensure proper seasoning.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix the minced garlic, dried thyme, and dried rosemary.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Rub the chicken fillets with the butter, then coat evenly with the garlic, thyme, and rosemary mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Place the seasoned chicken fillets in a baking dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Let the chicken rest for a few minutes before serving to allow the juices to redistribute.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
